data.client_settings: Hash: b29fecacbc15f7aa73a3fd6062f36f99fb4c4d30 due to build & app version being unknown
data.actual_result: Canary is broken and does not start on Stable nor PTB either.
data.short_description: On Windows, if you start/restart canary it won't ever boot again. And will break stable & ptb until you quit the canary processes
data.steps_to_repro: - Start Canary/reload/restart - Observe it not starting again - PTB and stable won't work either as long canary is running
